overview_of_class: Overview of class Biological foundations of speech and music. Topics include auditory system neuroanatomy and physiology, acoustics of speech and music, sound processing in the brain, cognitive, motor and reward influences on sound processing, and how auditory processing is enhanced in auditory experts (musicians/bilinguals) and impaired in populations with listening challenges.
name: Introduction to Sound Science
title: SoC SAI 502-0-20 Introduction to Sound Science

descriptions.name: Overview of class
